title_patterns: The {topic} Secret They Don't Want You To Know
{topic} Exposed: The Truth You Need To Know
hook_patterns: You won't believe what happens when...
What if I told you {surprising fact}?
The one thing {expert} got wrong about {topic}
I tried {topic} for {time period} and here's what happened
The {number} second rule that changes everything
What {influencer} doesn't want you to know about {topic}
I asked {number} people about {topic} and the results were surprising
The {adjective} way to {achieve outcome} that nobody tells you
If you {action}, you'll be surprised at what happens next
engagement_baits: Let me know in the comments what you think about {topic}
Can you guess what happens next in this {topic} scenario?
Share your favorite {topic} tip in the comments below
What's the most {adjective} thing that's happened to you related to {topic}?
Do you agree or disagree with this {topic} statement?
Tag a friend who needs to see this {topic} video
If you've tried {topic}, share your experience in the comments
What's the one thing you wish you knew about {topic} before trying it?
scroll_stop_openers: I just discovered a {topic} secret that will change everything
You won't believe what {influencer} just said about {topic}
The {number} second challenge that's sweeping the nation
What if I told you there's a {topic} hack that actually works?
I tried {topic} for {time period} and the results were astonishing
The one {topic} tip that will make you {desirable outcome}
The {adjective} truth about {common myth} that will shock you
I asked {number} experts about {topic} and here's what they said
retention_tricks: Start with a hook, then provide context
Use storytelling to make the content more relatable
Ask questions to keep the viewer engaged
Use humor to make the content more enjoyable
Make the content interactive, such as with quizzes or challenges
cta_formulas: Sign up now for {free resource} and get {desirable outcome}
Get instant access to {exclusive content} by clicking the link below
Join our {community} to connect with like-minded individuals
Download your free {guide} and start {achieving outcome} today
Take the {challenge} and see how you can {improve}
Click the link below to get {limited time offer} before it's gone
